data.text:
I'd been Air Shakur's trainer for a while. 
Things were going well, but there was one thing bothering me――
data.processed:
<story>I'd been Air Shakur's trainer for a while. 
<story>Things were going well, but there was one thing bothering me――

data.text: What do you want...?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: Uh... Want to get something to eat after training?
choices.processed: <size=33>Uh... Want to get something to eat after training?</size>

choices.text: Um... Do you want to get something to eat after training?
choices.processed: <size=29>Um... Do you want to get something to eat after training?</size>

data.processed: <story>What do you want...?

data.text: ...What?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...What?

data.text: That one thing was the distance between us.
data.processed: <story>That one thing was the distance between us.

data.text:
Her standing was shaky enough as it was. So I wanted to do 
anything I could to support her throughout the Twinkle Series.
data.processed:
<story>Her standing was shaky enough as it was. So I wanted to do 
<story>anything I could to support her throughout the Twinkle Series.

data.text:
It was absolutely essential for us to trust each other. 
It wouldn't happen overnight, so I had to lay the groundwork for 
building a good rapport.
data.processed:
<story>It was absolutely essential for us to trust each other. 
<story>It wouldn't happen overnight, so I had to lay the groundwork for 
<story>building a good rapport.

data.text:
So, with everything I learned about her, putting all the pieces 
together, I figured out some stuff that might pique her interest! 
Or so I thought――
data.processed:
<story>So, with everything I learned about her, putting all the pieces 
<story>together, I figured out some stuff that might pique her interest! 
<story>Or so I thought――

data.text:
Huh? An outdoor concert?
Hard pass.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Huh? An outdoor concert?
<story>Hard pass.

data.text: Hah? You built your own PC? You? Huh. ..........So?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: Hah? You built your own PC? You? Huh. ..........So?

data.text:
But it wasn't easy when she wanted to keep everything all 
professional.
data.processed:
<story>But it wasn't easy when she wanted to keep everything all 
<story>professional.

data.text:
Now you're on “Let's go somewhere together”?
What've you been tryna pull?
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: I want us to build a rapport.
I want us to build a rapport.

data.processed:
<story>Now you're on “Let's go somewhere together”?
<story>What've you been tryna pull?

data.text:
Don't bother. Look, I just needed you to fill the 『Trainer』 blank 
to debut, it was a arbitrary――
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: You're free to pick the spot.
You're free to pick the spot.

data.processed:
<story>Don't bother. Look, I just needed you to fill the 『Trainer』 blank 
<story>to debut, it was a arbitrary――

data.text:
“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
across.
data.processed:
<story>“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
<story>you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
<story>across.

data.text:
“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
across.
data.processed:
<story>“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
<story>you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
<story>across.

data.text:
All right, fine. I get it. Talking you down'd be a waste of time. 
...You said I could pick, yeah?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>All right, fine. I get it. Talking you down'd be a waste of time. 
<story>...You said I could pick, yeah?

data.text: Plans made, the next day came. It turns out she took me to――
data.processed: <story>Plans made, the next day came. It turns out she took me to――

data.text:
To top it off, she'd reserved separate, single-person booths. 
We weren't even next to each other. But, I did in fact say she was 
free to pick the spot, so I had no recourse.
data.processed:
<story>To top it off, she'd reserved separate, single-person booths. 
<story>We weren't even next to each other. But, I did in fact say she was 
<story>free to pick the spot, so I had no recourse.

data.text:
Well, given that I didn't know when she'd agree to go out again, 
this was the best shot I had. With that in mind――
data.processed:
<story>Well, given that I didn't know when she'd agree to go out again, 
<story>this was the best shot I had. With that in mind――

data.text:
What. 
Say something stupid and I'll kick your ass out.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>What. 
<story>Say something stupid and I'll kick your ass out.

data.text:
...
No, I'm not. That was stupider than I thought.
data.name: Air Shakur

choices.text: But, we're coming up on lunch time, so...
choices.processed: <size=40>But, we're coming up on lunch time, so...</size>

data.processed:
<story>...
<story>No, I'm not. That was stupider than I thought.

choices.text: W-well, at least get something to drink...
choices.processed: <size=40>W-well, at least get something to drink...</size>

data.text: SHUT UUUUP!
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: SHUT UUUUP!

data.text: Look, if you want to "build a rapport" or whatever...! Stay the hell! Out of my way!
data.name: エアシャカール
data.processed: Look, if you want to "build a rapport" or whatever...! Stay the hell! Out of my way!

data.text: Excuse me, dear customer, do you have a moment?
data.name: Net Cafe Staff A
data.processed: <story>Excuse me, dear customer, do you have a moment?

data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>HUH!? .....Oh.

data.text:
...
Tch, now it's tough to go back.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...
<story>Tch, now it's tough to go back.

data.text:
...Look, plenty of trainers keep it professional with their 
Umamusume. And more than a few of them are swimming in 
major trophies.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...Look, plenty of trainers keep it professional with their 
<story>Umamusume. And more than a few of them are swimming in 
<story>major trophies.

data.text: There's no way you don't know that. So there can only be one reason you're doing all this annoying crap.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: There's no way you don't know that. So there can only be one reason you're doing all this annoying crap.

data.text: You've deluded yourself into thinking getting all friendly would be for my benefit. That I'm such a pitiful, antisocial loner, you just have to help me.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: You've deluded yourself into thinking getting all friendly would be for my benefit. That I'm such a pitiful, antisocial loner, you just have to help me.

data.text:
...something along those lines, I'd bet. 
You ain't the first.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>...something along those lines, I'd bet. 
<story>You ain't the first.

data.text:
The only partner I need is my PC. If you get that, don't try to 
drag me out with you again.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>The only partner I need is my PC. If you get that, don't try to 
<story>drag me out with you again.

data.text:
It was true that Shakur could make it as a loner. 
In all likelihood, she had the mental toughness and analytical 
ability to get by herself just fine.
data.processed:
<story>It was true that Shakur could make it as a loner. 
<story>In all likelihood, she had the mental toughness and analytical 
<story>ability to get by herself just fine.

data.text: If something unlikely happened―― if she met an obstacle she could not overcome alone― If she found herself in a position where she needed help, there would be nothing she could do.

choices.text: I won't give up just like that.

data.processed: If something unlikely happened―― if she met an obstacle she could not overcome alone― If she found herself in a position where she needed help, there would be nothing she could do.

data.text: ...The hell?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...The hell?

data.text:
Illogical as ever. 
It'd be easier for you to give up, with all the effort you waste 
yapping.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>Illogical as ever. 
<story>It'd be easier for you to give up, with all the effort you waste 
<story>yapping.

data.text: ...You do you.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>...You do you.
